_comment: Created by ianb on 08/10/2013 13:50:52 using v0.9
title: How many people with depression/anxiety disorders access services and has this changed?
analysis_commentary: The access rate of people with anxiety and/or depression to IAPT services was 2.5% in 2012/13 Q4. This was a slight increase from 2.0%, when the data was initially collected in 2011/12 Q1. This relates to nearly 31,000 extra individuals a quarter with anxiety and/or depression receiving IAPT services.
data_source: Health & Social Care Information Centre, Improving Access to Psychological Therapies Data Set
